reviewText: Great song.
Great Movie!
great movie  the whole family enjoyed it

Once more Kenny Rogers steps into another TV movie based off a song that he sang only this time we are not looking at a western style TV movie.  Instead this movie is set more in to the 40s time period and follows along historical path of WWII.  There is a strong moral message here and it holds true from one generation to the next.  This movie does not have the laughter that we saw in the Gambler movies; but there is still bits and pieces of humor that can be found.

Kenny Rogers Is Amazing In This Role As Preacher, Uncle And Gambling Man!..Has Wisdom Beyond His Years..Nephew Tommy Wants To Keep His Promise To His Dad..But One Day..You Just Have To See It..Must See!!
